Articles.Content:
I am searching about a really simple part, a equilateral triangle structural panel, don't care about the size.
Can someone help me?

Thanks to reply.

Perhaps you are looking for a mod?
In which case you may find more luck around the Add-On Discussion subforum.
AFAIK, there are no stock parts fitting that description, and as far as I've seen, few to no mods have that shape structural part, unless you make one with b9 procedural parts.
If you can't find anything there, make a request! And perhaps let potential modders know what you want to use it for so they're inspired?

Oh, and welcome to the forums!

Edited May 6, 2016 by Venusgate
Ven's Stock Revamp has just that kind of thing, I can't find a screen anywhere, but try installing that and see if you can find it:
